mapper.select: -- deleted=0またはNULLの学生を取得(論理削除済みを除外) SELECT id, name, kanaName, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark, deleted FROM students WHERE deleted IS NULL OR deleted = 0 ORDER BY id
-- 指定されたIDの学生を取得(論理削除済みは除外) SELECT id, name, kanaName, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark, deleted FROM students WHERE id = #{id} AND (deleted IS NULL OR deleted = 0)

-- 受講生名を含むコース一覧を取得 SELECT sc.id as course_id, sc.student_id as student_id, sc.course_name as course_name, sc.course_start_at as course_start_at, sc.course_end_at as course_end_at, s.name as student_name, es.id as enrollment_status_id, es.course_id as enrollment_course_id, es.status as enrollment_status FROM students_courses sc LEFT JOIN students s ON sc.student_id = s.id LEFT JOIN enrollment_status es ON sc.id = es.course_id ORDER BY sc.student_id, sc.id

SELECT sc.id as course_id, sc.student_id as student_id, sc.course_name as course_name, sc.course_start_at as course_start_at, sc.course_end_at as course_end_at, es.id as enrollment_status_id, es.course_id as enrollment_course_id, es.status as enrollment_status FROM students_courses sc LEFT JOIN enrollment_status es ON sc.id = es.course_id WHERE sc.student_id = #{studentId} ORDER BY sc.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(name, kanaName, nickname, email, area, age, sex, remark) VALUES (#{name}, #{kanaName}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{remark})
INSERT INTO students_courses(student_id, course_name, course_start_at, course_end_at) VALUES(#{studentId}, #{courseName}, #{courseStartAt}, #{courseEndAt})
mapper.update: -- 論理削除: deletedフラグを1に設定 UPDATE students SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
